subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I just want to say...
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0228_01CA216C.5F44A800
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

To be honest, I am still very skeptical about the Frank's Box type of techn=
ology, as I have not heard anything convincing enough for me personally to =
say yeah-that is spirit communication. But I do remain open to the possibil=
ity.

But that is my problem not anyone else's, and this is why I have refr=
ained from commenting too much on anyone's results.

  ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
  From: bulletbabea 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wedne=
sday, August 19, 2009 8:32 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: I just want to say..=
.


    I think it varies depending on who you ask as well as what they hav=
e personally experienced. As an example, some people believe in angels and =
demons others do not. Therefor some may get messages that correspond to the=
ir own beliefs as well as the beliefs of those who are speaking.

  Almost =
every person who does this eventually develops a theory that may change ove=
r time based on what they experience and what their beliefs are. Then there=
 are those who remain undecided or have doubts.

  As for me I look at it a=
s purely educational, a learning experience. Ive met many people I never kn=
ew existed. Ive researched topics I'd never even considered. Ive gotten mes=
sages and images that are awe inspiring and many interesting concepts to po=
nder and explore.

  There are many glimpses of truth, as well as momentary=
 proof along the way that lead me to develop my own theory and eventually y=
ou will develop your own too. This research is fascinating and can be quite=
 mind blowing.

  I dont worry what anyone else thinks. I have no need to p=
rove anything to anyone else. They can do that for themselves. I always say=
 honesty is the best policy and if you are honest with yourself and others =
the only ones who object are those who's lies arent tolerated. So just look=
 for the truth yourself and dont let me or anyone else tell you what that i=
s. 

  It's a great journey and your path is your own!

  Misty

  --- In E=
VP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "mrscaptainjack2" <jjkamp@...> wrote:
  >
  > Thank=
 you, guys, but I just wanted to make sure -- really sure. Sometimes it's h=
ard on here to figure out which post is replying to which!
  > 
  > So I've=
 been thinking about this over and over -- I've been able to think of littl=
e else in the last few days -- trying to figure this out and make some sort=
 of reasonable theory I can live with. I know we will never have a true ans=
wer, at least not any time soon, but surely those who have been doing this =
for years and years must have a working theory on what these entities are? =
Based on their behavior rather than what they say? Based on consistencies f=
rom researcher to researcher? Based on things these entities know and don't=
 know (e.g. knew my dad's friend Gordy was dead, while I did not)?
  >



 =
 
------=_NextPart_000_0228_01CA216C.5F44A800
